name: Wekanocalypse
description: Very dark Wekan, because I hate light backgrounds
additional_info: License, Release notes, versioning info, change log, instructions, credits, Issues, Requests, PRs, etc at the github repo --> https://github.com/joshuacox/wekanocalypse
css: @-moz-document domain("wekan.thalhalla.net"),domain("wekan.indie.host"),url-prefix("https://wekan."),url-prefix("http://wekan."){#header,#header-quick-access,#header-quick-access ul li,#header-quick-access.board-color-belize,.member .avatar.avatar-initials,body,hr{color:#80ff80;background:#570057}#modal .modal-content,.card-details .card-details-header,.list-body .open-minicard-composer,.setting-content{color:#4dff4d;background:#303}.card-details,.minicard{color:#00e600;background:#1a001a}.setting-content .content-body .main-body,.setting-content .content-body .side-menu{color:#005700;background:#570057}.board-list .is-star-active,.setting-content .content-body .side-menu ul li.active{color:#80ff00;background:#57002b}#header.board-color-belize,.board-backgrounds-list .board-color-belize.background-box,.board-color-belize.sk-spinner div,.board-list .board-color-belize a,.board-list .board-list-item{color:#00e600;background-color:#1a001a}tbody{background-color:#1a001a}#header,#header #header-main-bar .board-header-btn,#header #header-main-bar .board-header-btn i.fa,#header #header-main-bar .setting-header-btn,#header #header-main-bar .setting-header-btn i.fa,.list .list-composer .open-list-composer,.list.list-composer .open-list-composer,.sidebar .sidebar-shortcuts,a i.fa,a.fa{color:#4dff4d}.sidebar .sidebar-content h3,.sidebar .sidebar-shadow,.sidebar-tongue{background:#303}#header-quick-access #header-new-board-icon,#header-quick-access #header-user-bar,#header-quick-access ul li,.activities .activity .activity-desc .activity-meta,.setting-content .content-body .main-body,.setting-content .content-body .side-menu{color:#00e600}a{color:#80ff80;background-color:inherit}.list{color:#4dff4d;background:#303;border-left:1px solid #1a001a}.checklist-items .item:hover{background-color:#2b0057}.draggable-hover-card .minicard,.is-selected .minicard,.list-body .open-minicard-composer:hover,.minicard:hover:not(.minicard-composer){color:#00ff80;background:#2b0057}.new-comment textarea{color:#00e600;background:#000}.board-color-belize button.primary[type=submit],.board-color-belize input.primary[type=submit]{color:#0ff;background:#570000}.activities .activity .activity-desc .activity-checklist,.activities .activity .activity-desc .activity-comment,.js-new-board-title,.list .list-composer .list-name-input,.list.list-composer .list-name-input,button,input:not([type=file]),input[type=email]:focus,input[type=password]:focus,input[type=text]:focus,textarea,textarea:focus{color:#00e600;background:#1a001a;border:1px solid #303}.card-details .card-details-item-title{color:#00e600}.card-label.add-label,.member.add-member{box-shadow:0 0 0 2px #80ff80 inset}.pop-over .header{color:#4dff4d;border-bottom:1px solid #303;background:#303}.pop-over{background:#1a001a;border:1px solid #1a001a}kbd{color:#00e600;background:#1a001a;border:1px solid #1a001a}.shortcuts-list .shortcuts-list-item{border-bottom:1px solid #1a001a}.board-list .js-add-board :hover,button.primary:focus,button.primary:hover,input.primary[type=submit]:focus,input.primary[type=submit]:hover{background:#2b0057}.quiet,.quiet a{color:#4dff4d}button.primary,input.primary[type=submit]{background:#570000}.warning{color:#ff8000;background:#007fff}td,th{border-right:1px solid #1a001a;border-bottom:1px solid #1a001a}table,td,th{border-top:1px solid #1a001a;border-left:1px solid #1a001a}.setting-content .content-body .side-menu{background-color:#1a001a;border:1px solid #1a001a}}
